pages.text: $(li)The Ice Spikes is a cold biome which is composed mainly by Snow and Ice.$(br)$(li)Itcan be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This is a good place to recolect Packet Ice and Snow for your constructions, but you will not find any creature or vegetation here.
$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Ice Spikes$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
